message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to us both. This unique offering is worth $1,200,000 to you, and I believe it has the potential to significantly impact your endeavors. After careful consideration, I propose to sell this product to you for $1,100,000. This price reflects my commitment to ensuring a fair transaction while maximizing the value for both parties involved. I am confident that this deal will not only meet but exceed your expectations, providing you with a valuable asset that aligns with your goals and aspirations. Please let me know if you require any additional information or have questions about the product. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of working together.
